UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Synthesis and Antimicrobial Activity of Short Analogues of the Marine Antimicrobial Peptide Turgencin A: Effects of SAR Optimizations, Cys-Cys Cyclization and Lipopeptide Modifications.
Literature.Author: Dey H, Simonovic D, Norberg-Schulz Hagen I, Vasskog T, Fredheim EGA, Blencke HM, Anderssen T, Strøm MB, Haug T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µg/ml),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µg/ml),Aureobasidium pullulans(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=64µg/ml),Rhodotorula sp.(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli MC4100(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli MC4100 NR698(MIC=8µg/ml)
